reviewText: I used to watch this video in the late 80s and early 90s. The music videos are great and and they will bring back some good memories. I just wish i could find it on dvd.

Great video stories to match the lyrics along with the original music cuts....American Pie, Don McLean, the BEST!!!!  Some don't make much sense but they have great casts, Teri Garr, Harry Dean Stanton, etc....
Everyone should own this if they love 60's music.
GHM
